PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02602012-03-08,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  EC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999, in order to manage human health and environmental risks posed by the following four substances: Propane, 2-nitro-; 2-Nitrotoluene; DTBSBP; MAPBAP acetate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0040 Publication Date: 2012-03-28
AttachmentsAttachment
